title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Boil spaghetti in salted water until al dente. 2. Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy. 3. Beat eggs and mix with Parmesan. 4. Drain spaghetti and toss with pancetta and egg mixture. 5. Serve with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill the chicken until cooked. 3. Cook onion, ginger, and garlic in a pan, then add tomato puree and spices. 4. Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer until thick. 5. Garnish with cilantro and serve.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A colorful mix of vegetables stir-fried in a savory soy sauce.
instructions: 1. Heat olive oil in a pan, add garlic. 2. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. 3. Add soy sauce and sesame oil, and cook for another 2 minutes. 4. Garnish with sesame seeds and serve.
